directions: Put all your ingredients in your crockpot
4.5 pound bottom round steak cut in strips, 2 red peppers sliced, 1 small onion sliced, 1 cup beef broth, 1 packet of Italian dressing
Heat on low for 6-8 hours or high for 3-4 hours
Mine are lunches for the week so I prep my containers
A slice of provolone each - I plan to eat in a low carb wrap!
ingredients: 4.5 pound bottom round steak cut in strips, 2 red peppers sliced, 1 small onion sliced, 1 cup beef broth, 1 packet of Italian dressing
title: Crockpot steak lunch
